text: Bergstraße or Bergstrasse can mean many things, including: *Bergstraße Route – The Mountain route in the Odenwald of Baden-Württemberg and Hesse *Kreis Bergstraße – A rural district in Hesse *Hessische Bergstraße – A Hessian winegrowing region *Badische Bergstraße – A winegrowing region in Baden- Württemberg
title: Bergstraße
